p: Primary monocyte-derived macrophages (MDMs) are susceptible to HIV-1 infection, and its replication capacity is dependent on SAMHD1 expression. Additionally, M-CSF-induced differentiation initiates MDM proliferation accompanied by SAMHD1 phosphorylation. Thus, HIV-1 infection of MDM provides an excellent model in which to test the activity of antimetabolite drug efficacy.
